WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing. Thanks for helping out KiarashSz!
WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
I updated TypeScript to v0.8.2(also Web Essentials installed) BUT when i save ts files,this error is appear:

```
/*

Compile Error. 
See error list for details
 The TypeScript compiler couldn't be found. Download http://www.typescriptlang.org/#Download

*/
```
WorkItem.Summary: The TypeScript compiler couldn't be found

Comments.Message: Upgrade Web Essentials to 2.4 -- versions less than this (2.3.x) will give this error.
very thanks, after update Web Essentials to 2.4 problem solved.
my bad, it was web essential upgrade that was required.
